text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump All you're doing is instead of a coronavirus task force briefing, you're now calling it a press conference. Call it what you will, it's still just a mini rally. How long b4 this one goes off the rails? All bc the deranged idiot needs to have his stupid face in front of a camera.
